content: fan below treble_crochet double_crochet into every st and chain space across the row stop when you get the the fan below you should have 63 sts in total chain 3 and sl-st into the chain space of the fan below turn the pattern from this point is a simple repeat of row 6 through to row 9 i continued working these 4 row until i had used up all of my whirl i made 44 row of pretty maids all in a row in total when i completed row 9 on my final row i did add in a fan on each side just to finish off i would recommend gently blocking your wrap once you ve finished as this will help to bring out the design more my scarf measured 73 inches by 14 inches after blocking i really hope you ve enjoyed making my scarf i d love to see your makes so please tag me on instagram or facebook so i can follow your yarny adventures enjoy suzy xx this is a simple chart pattern showing show to start and end each row the green highlights the repeats
